name: css-flex-basis
description: Css module of single purpose classes for flex basis

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-flex-basis.css > css/css-flex-basis.css && tachyons src/css-flex-basis.css --minify > css/css-flex-basis.min.css && tachyons src/css-flex-basis.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
